rules_text: The owner of target spell or permanent reveals their hand, then shuffles it and each spell, permanent, card in hand and/or graveyard with the same name as that spell or permanent into their library.
notes:
OG_1:
Was a uncommon blue card.

When you cast this spell, if it’s not your turn, copy it.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.
Draw a card, then discard a card.
